Live in brand new construction, move-in ready homes while being just minutes away from The Heights, restaurants, coffee shops, shopping and more.

Looking for a new home in Beyond Metronome? It is a great time to buy real estate in Beyond Metronome and our site is a great place to begin your search. You can check out Beyond Metronome schools, market statistics, the latest listings and more. Whether you are a first-time home buyer or you are already familiar with the home buying process, you can be assured that you have the best tools and the perfect agent available to help with your Beyond Metronome home search. Beyond Metronome is conveniently located in Spring Branch. Currently on the market is 2071 Sherwood Forest, a two story, 1,793 Sqft. single-family home with a palatial open layout that has an abundance of natural light. The modern kitchen overlooks the living room, and is complete with quartz countertops, sleek new appliances, bar seating and a charming farmhouse style sink. All bedrooms contain vaulted ceilings and spacious walk-in closets. The stunning master bath has jack and jill sinks and a luxurious glass standing shower paired with a pictiresque soaking tub. Other amenities include a private fenced in community, engineered wooden floors in the living areas, modern lighting fixtures throughout the home and more!

This stunning new home has 4 bedrooms & 4.5 baths. With amenities such as a game room, media room and a four car garage, this home is a must-see! The gorgeous kitchen is complete with an island with a farmhouse style sink, bar seating, and all new appliances. Overlooking the kitchen is the spacious dining room which features stunning wooden floors. The spa-like master bath has his and hers sinks, a standing shower and a luxurious alcove tub. Other amenities of this home include large walk in closets, a gorgeous staircase, and an outdoor patio and kitchen. The Nan new home team can assist the J. Patrick client with seller assistant programs, and guaranteed buyout. We are here to make your home buying process as seamless as possible. Come experience for yourself what the community of Artavia has to offer!
